mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, hit_cnt, TO_DATE(created_datetime , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS created_datetime FROM t_board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( board_idx, title, contents, created_datetime, creator_id ) VALUES ( board_idx_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{creatorId} )

INSERT INTO Users ( user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_address, access_rights ) VALUES ( users_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress}, 'user' )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE NVL2(user_name, #{userName}, "") OR NVL2(user_email, #{userEmail}, "") OR NVL2(user_no, #{userNo}, -1)
